DOC.brief_summary: INTRODUCTION : Vulvodynia ( chronic vulvar pain absence clinical finding ) negative impact quality life woman diagnose . The exist treatment , however , manifold insufficient . This study aim verify effectiveness kinesiotherapy electrotherapy adjuvant method treatment vulvodynia . METHODS : A single-blind randomized control trial examine 58 woman , divide three treatment arm : use tricyclic antidepressant alone ( hydrochloride Amitriptyline ) , amitriptyline hydrochloride associate pelvic floor muscle exercise amitriptyline hydrochloride associate electrotherapy ( interferential current ) . Exclusion criterion : presence infection genital cancer , chronic degenerative disease ; young 18 year , neurological disease jeopardize contraction muscle pelvic floor , take antidepressant drug interaction amitriptyline hydrochloride pacemaker use . The parameter analyze treatment : muscle volume anus elevator perfusion pudendal artery obtain 3D ultrasound , subjective pain vaginal intercourse ( visual analog scale ) , monthly frequency vaginal intercourse , pain refer within vulvar touch physical examination ( swab test zero 10 ) female sexual function ( Female Sexual Function questionnaire - FSFI ) . There follow subjective pain vaginal intercourse monthly frequency vaginal intercourse obtain telephone contact voluntary one , six twelve month end intervention . The data analyze use Chi-square test Pearson , Fisher exact Mann-Whitney . The begin end treatment compare use Wilcoxon test ( related sample ) McNemar ( effect intervention ) , consider statistical significance level 5 % . The software use statistical analysis software ( SAS ) - Release 9.1 , SAS Institute , Cary , North Carolina , USA , 2002-2003 Statistical Package Social Sciences ( SPSS ) -Release 17.0 .
DOC.brief_title: Physical Therapy Adjuvant Treatment Vulvodynia : Randomized Controled Trial
DOC.detailed_description: GOALS 1 . General Check effectiveness physical therapy apply pelvic floor muscle use adjunct standard treatment ( amitriptyline hydrochloride ) improvement symptom vulvodynia . 2 . Specific Check compare woman vulvodynia randomly assign three treatment arm ( drug drug associate therapeutic exercise medication associate electrotherapy CI ) : - Pain intercourse swab test obtain Visual Analogue Scale ( VAS ) ; - The score obtain questionnaire Female Sexual Function Index ( FSFI ) ; - The change volume puborectal , pubococcygeus iliococcygeal muscle access Tridimensional Ultrasound ( US3D ) ; - The variation perfusion pelvic floor muscle pudendal artery obtain 3D ultrasound ; - The effectiveness therapeutic exercise improvement vulvar pain test swab sexual intercourse penetration woman diagnose vulvodynia ; - The effectiveness electrical therapy interferential current improvement vulvar pain test swab sexual intercourse penetration woman diagnose vulvodynia ; - Compare effectiveness electrical therapy kinesiotherapy improvement vulvar pain ; - Compare effectiveness physical therapy adjunct standard standard treatment alone . SUBJECTS AND METHODS : 1 . Study design : clinical trial randomize control single-blind . Designed accord CONSORT standard , pending completion project approval Brazil Platform final implementation , schedule July 2016 . 2 . Sample size : To calculate sample size , sought literature study address main variable analyze study ( FSFI score physical therapy intervention medication versus medication , change visual analog pain scale intervention ) . The study whose design statistical analysis closer propose project use calculate sample , purpose compare woman vulvodynia , improvement pain use VAS pain sexual function index use FSFI undergoing session transcutaneous electrical stimulation ( TENS ) ( 65 ) . Assuming type II alpha error probability equal 0.05 study power equal 80 % , consider average VAS score 8 ( ± 3.4 ) 2.2 ( ± 6.1 ) , sample size calculation estimate use Small software Stata 13.1 n = 16 group , total n = 48 . However , study follow-up two month assume loss follow-up 20 % total number sample , assume sample size n = 58 . 3 . Variables concept : 3.1 Independent Variables Vulvodynia Characterized present absent , diagnose presence vulvar pain sexual penetration touch gynecological self-reported , burn light touch lobby ( swab test [ 13 ] ) erythema . It classify localized generalize . 3.2 Dependent Variables Muscle thickness - Measure cross levator ani muscle give millimeter , obtain 3D US three situation : rest , maximum voluntary contraction Valsalva ; Perfusion pudendal artery - blood flow pudendal artery , give millimeter per square centimeter ( mm / cm2 ) obtain 3D US . Pain say vaginal penetration - mean refer pain sexual intercourse vaginal penetration , point use visual analog scale ( VAS ) range zero 10 , ten maximum note high pain threshold . FSFI - female sexual function index , measure score obtain self-administered questionnaire FSFI ( Female Sexual Function Index ) , propose evaluate woman 's sexual response area : desire , arousal , vaginal lubrication , orgasm , sexual satisfaction pain . Assesses relative strength field female sexual response transform subjective measure objective , quantifiable analyzable data . Applied therapeutic exercise program apply pelvic floor . 3.3 Control variable BMI : body mass index , obtain divide weight kilogram height meter square . Categorized assess degree obesity individual , consider underweight BMI < 20 ; ideal weight BMI = 20 25 ; overweight BMI = 26 30 ; moderate obesity BMI = 31 35 ; severe obesity BMI = 36 40 ; Morbid obesity BMI = 41 50 ; super obesity BMI > 50 . Treatment vulvodynia use kinesiotherapy : technique previously test therapy reduce nuisance cause vulvodynia . Given ordinal number ; Education : number year study refer subject . Given ordinal number ; Marital status : marital status subject time study . Categorized ( I ) steady partner ( II ) without professional occupation ; Skin color : skin color refer subject .
